data.eml:eml: A new pygmy squid, Idiosepius hallami n. sp. (Cephalopoda: Idiosepiidae) from eastern Australia and elevation of the southern endemic ‘ notoides’ clade to a new genus, Xipholeptos n. gen.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reid, Amanda L., Strugnell, Jan M. (2018): A new pygmy squid, Idiosepius hallami n. sp. (Cephalopoda: Idiosepiidae) from eastern Australia and elevation of the southern endemic ‘ notoides’ clade to a new genus, Xipholeptos n. gen. Zootaxa 4369 (4): 451-486, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.4.1
